description: The video, which has rocked French politics, brought down a political ally of President Emmanuel Macron.
title: Petr Pavlensky: Russian activist's girlfriend held over Macron ally sex video
title_page: Petr Pavlensky: Russian activist's girlfriend held over Macron ally sex video - BBC News
maintext: Before his arrest, he told French news channel LCI that Mr Griveaux was only the first politician that he would target, saying he would carry on fighting the "propaganda and puritanism of politicians".
